scripts.prebuild: mkdirp dist/css && mkdirp dist/js && mkdirp dist/img
scripts.build: npm run make-css && npm run render-html && npm run img && npm run js
scripts.make-css: npm run sass && npm run postcss && copyfiles -f node_modules/slick-carousel/slick/slick.css dist/css
scripts.js: copyfiles -f src/js/site.js dist/js && copyfiles -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/js && copyfiles -f node_modules/slick-carousel/slick/slick.min.js dist/js
